Control Name: Communicates Objectives Related to Confidentiality and Changes to Objectives— The entity communicates, to external users, vendors, business partners and others whose products and services are part of the system, objectives and changes to objectives related to confidentiality.

control_attributes.Control: Communicates Objectives Related to Confidentiality and Changes to Objectives— The entity communicates, to external users, vendors, business partners and others whose products and services are part of the system, objectives and changes to objectives related to confidentiality.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC2.3 COSO Principle 15: The entity communicates with external parties regarding matters affecting the functioning of internal control.
